synthesis_conditions.description: Synthesized according to a previous method.

synthesis_conditions.chemicals_used: m-H4TTFTB (0.010 g, 0.015 mmol), DyCl3·6H2O (0.010 g, 0.027 mmol)
synthesis_conditions.washing_method: Washed with DMF and CH3COCH3 three times

synthesis_conditions.description: Crystals of Dy-m-TTFTB were soaked in a solution of iodine in cyclohexane (0.1 M) at room temperature for 12 hours.
Crystals of Dy-m-TTFTB were soaked in a solution of AgNO3 in methanol (0.1 M) at room temperature for 12 hours.
For increased TTF radical concentration, the material was further soaked in a solution of AgNO3 in cyclohexane (0.1 M) at room temperature for 12 hours.
